title: How to Make Candy Cane Cheesecake

steps.headline: Make the cookie crust.
steps.description: In a large bowl, thoroughly combine the cookie crumbs, 1/4 cup butter, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Press the mixture down firmly and evenly in a 9-inch springform pan, on the bottom and around the sides.

steps.headline: Make the mixture.
steps.description: In another large bowl, whisk the eggs, 1/2 cup sugar, sour cream, flour, vanilla, and peppermint extracts. Whip in the cream cheese and 2 tablespoons butter. Fold the peppermint candy in until thoroughly incorporated.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture evenly in the pie crust.

steps.description: Cool completely before chilling in the refrigerator overnight.

steps.headline: Garnish the cheesecake with finely chopped candy canes and whipped cream.

text: Preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC.  Make the cookie crust. In a large bowl, thoroughly combine the cookie crumbs, 1/4 cup butter, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Press the mixture down firmly and evenly in a 9-inch springform pan, on the bottom and around the sides. Make the mixture. In another large bowl, whisk the eggs, 1/2 cup sugar, sour cream, flour, vanilla, and peppermint extracts. Whip in the cream cheese and 2 tablespoons butter. Fold the peppermint candy in until thoroughly incorporated. Pour the mixture evenly in the pie crust.  Bake the cheesecake for 50 to 60 minutes. Cool completely before chilling in the refrigerator overnight. Garnish the cheesecake with finely chopped candy canes and whipped cream.
